mapper.select: SELECT THESIS.THESIS_SN, THESIS.USER_NO, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(THESIS.RECEIPT_DT,'%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y.%m.%d') AS RECEIPT_DT, THESIS.MAGAZINE_NM, THESIS.PBLS_TITLE_NO, THESIS.CTS, THESIS.PBLSR_PHONENO, THESIS.PBLS_DEPT_NM, THESIS.REG_NO, THESIS.REG_DTTM, THESIS.MOD_NO, THESIS.MOD_DTTM , FN_GET_USER_NAME(THESIS.MOD_NO) AS MOD_NM , FN_GET_USER_NAME(THESIS.REG_NO) AS REG_NM FROM tb_tch_thesis THESIS WHERE THESIS.USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY THESIS.THESIS_SN

SELECT THESIS.THESIS_SN, THESIS.USER_NO, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(THESIS.RECEIPT_DT,'%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y.%m.%d') AS RECEIPT_DT, THESIS.MAGAZINE_NM, THESIS.PBLS_TITLE_NO, THESIS.CTS, THESIS.PBLSR_PHONENO, THESIS.PBLS_DEPT_NM, THESIS.REG_NO, THESIS.REG_DTTM, THESIS.MOD_NO, THESIS.MOD_DTTM , FN_GET_USER_NAME(THESIS.MOD_NO) AS MOD_NM , FN_GET_USER_NAME(THESIS.REG_NO) AS REG_NM FROM tb_tch_thesis THESIS WHERE THESIS.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND THESIS.THESIS_SN = #{thesisSn}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_tch_thesis THESIS_SN, USER_NO, RECEIPT_DT, MAGAZINE_NM, PBLS_TITLE_NO, CTS, PBLSR_PHONENO, PBLS_DEPT_NM, REG_NO, REG_DTTM, MOD_NO, MOD_DTTM) VALUES ( #{thesisSn}, #{userNo}, replace(#{receiptDt},'.',''), #{magazineNm}, #{pblsTitleNo}, #{cts}, #{pblsrPhoneno}, #{pblsDeptNm}, #{regNo},DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), #{modNo},DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'))
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_tch_thesis SET RECEIPT_DT = replace(#{receiptDt},'.',''), MAGAZINE_NM = #{magazineNm}, PBLS_TITLE_NO = #{pblsTitleNo}, CTS = #{cts}, PBLSR_PHONENO = #{pblsrPhoneno}, PBLS_DEPT_NM = #{pblsDeptNm}, MOD_NO = #{modNo}, MOD_DTTM = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND THESIS_SN = #{thesisSn}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_tch_thesis WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND THESIS_SN = #{thesisSn}
